alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Ascension; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower Terrebonne; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 1:46PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, eastern St. James, St. Charles, northeastern Terrebonne, southeastern Livingston, Lafourche, Jefferson, west central Plaquemines and east central Assumption Parishes through 245 PM CST... At 146 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Schriever to near Leeville. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Reserve, Cut Off, Hahnville, Laplace, Marrero, Port Sulphur, Galliano, Avondale, Larose, Harvey, Belle Chasse, Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, Westwego, Gramercy, Lutcher and Lockport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 192 and 224. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
